dataList.name: A Broken Dream
dataList.desc:
Upon obtaining this E.G.O Gift, gain the following effects:
• Don Quixote's level rises to 50
• Don Quixote's Uptie and Threadspin Tiers rise to Tier 4
(If the Level, Uptie Tier, or Threadspin Tier are higher than the above values, then maintain those values.)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Don Quixote's level rises to 50
Don Quixote's Uptie and Threadspin Tiers rise to Tier 4

dataList.name: La Manchaland All-day Pass
dataList.desc: On Hit against targets with 10+ (sum of [Laceration], 'Unique Bleed', and [Burst]): gain 1 [Breath] Potency and Count (3 times per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Hit against targets with 10+ (sum of [Laceration], 'Unique Bleed', and [Burst]): gain 1 [Breath] Potency and Count

dataList.name: La Manchaland Standard Pass
dataList.desc: First Turn Start of an Encounter: all units gain 4 [Laceration] Potency and Count.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: First Turn Start of an Encounter: all units gain 4 [Laceration] Potency and Count.

dataList.name: Token of Victory
dataList.desc:
On Kill with a Skill damage: 1 ally with the least SP heals 8 SP.
After Attack: if an enemy with 10+ (sum of [Laceration], 'Unique Bleed', and [Burst]) is defeated, the unit who killed that enemy gains 2 [AttackUp] next turn. (3 times per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Kill, 1 ally with the least SP heals 8 SP.
After Attack: if an enemy with 10+ (sum of [Laceration], 'Unique Bleed', and [Burst]) is defeated, the unit who killed that enemy gains 2 [AttackUp] next turn.

dataList.name: Self-flagellation Whip
dataList.desc: When 1 ally with currently the highest HP percentage uses an Attack Skill, gain 10 [Laceration], 3 [AttackUp], and 3 [DefenseUp]. (once per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When 1 ally with currently the highest HP percentage uses an Attack Skill, gain 10 [Laceration], 3 [AttackUp], and 3 [DefenseUp].

dataList.name: Mask of the Parade
dataList.desc: Chain Battles: when a new enemy enters the battle, inflict 5 [Laceration] and +3 [Laceration] Count against that enemy at Combat Start.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Chain Battles: when a new enemy enters the battle, inflict 5 [Laceration] and +3 [Laceration] Count against that enemy at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Devouring Cube
dataList.desc:
When an ally dies, gain 1 E.G.O resource for each of that ally's Skills 1, 2, and 3 and 1 random E.G.O resource
After Attack: if the enemy is killed, gain 1 random E.G.O resource (once per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When an ally dies, gain 1 E.G.O resource for each of that ally's Skills 1, 2, and 3 and 1 random E.G.O resource
After Attack: if the enemy is killed, gain 1 random E.G.O resource (once per Skill)

dataList.name: Endless Hunger
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: every Identity on the field loses 5 SP and gains 1 [Enhancement] for 3 turns.
If the said Identity is a Bloodfiend, lose 10 SP, gain 2 [Enhancement] for 3 turns, and inflict +1 more [Laceration] Potency and Count with its Skill & Coin effects

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: First Turn Start of an Encounter: every Identity on the field loses 5 SP and gains 1 [Enhancement] for 3 turns.
If the said Identity is a Bloodfiend, lose 10 SP, gain 2 [Enhancement] for 3 turns, and inflict +1 more [Laceration] Potency and Count with its Skill & Coin effects

dataList.name: A Little Dream
dataList.desc:
On Clash Win with a Pride Skill: heal 5 SP.
On Hit after Clash Win with the said Skill: inflict +1 [Laceration] Count and +1 [Burst] Count (4 times per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Clash Win with a Pride Skill: heal 5 SP, and On Hit after Clash Win with the said Skill, inflict +1 [Laceration] Count and +1 [Burst] Count

dataList.name: A Hollow Dream
dataList.desc:
On Hit against targets with [Laceration] or 'Unique Bleed': heal 2~5 HP.
Skills that consume [BloodDinner]: Coin Power +1

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal HP On Hit against targets with [Laceration] or 'Unique Bleed'.
Skills that consume [BloodDinner]: Coin Power +1

dataList.name: The Dream Begins Anew
dataList.desc:
All of Don Quixote's Skills gain Final Power +2
When an ally dies, the remaining allies heal 15 SP, and at Turn End, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn (max [Enhancement]: 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Don Quixote's Skill Final Power +2
When an ally dies, the remaining allies heal 15 SP, and at Turn End, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn

dataList.name: Grimy Iron Stake
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy using a single-Coin Skill, inflict 1 [Laceration] Potency. Inflict 2 [DefenseDown] until the end of the next turn.
If the target already has [Laceration] or 'Unique Bleed', inflict 3 [Laceration] Potency instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 1 [Laceration] Potency. Inflict 2 [DefenseDown] until the end of the next turn
Inflict 3 [Laceration] Potency

dataList.name: Barbed Lasso
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Inflict [Burst] Potency on all enemies equal to their current Speed values.

When activating Lust Absolute Resonance, apply 3 [Burst] Potency and +3 [Burst] Count to a random enemy at Combat Start.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict [Burst] Potency by Speed
Inflict 3 [Burst] Potency and +3 [Burst] Count

dataList.name: Carmilla
dataList.desc: At the start of a non-Focused Encounter, all enemies take fixed damage equal to 20% of their Max HP.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 20% of Max HP as fixed damage
